actions.name: Smokescreen
actions.description: Effect: An Obscurring Cloud is created in the [Blast X] area for 5 rounds. An enemy creature that starts their activation in or enters a space containing an Obscurring Cloud Hazard gains @Affliction[blinded] 2.

system.description:
